//server setting activity PIN Protocol Server Setting Domain IP Address Context Path Check Save HTTP HTTPS (Secure HTTP) Address
//get register activity Application Not Register Currently, your application is not registered to the FAMS System for using on this device.

To continue, your application and device must be registered.

Go for registration by clicking the following button.
Register
Application Registration Device Name Login ID Password Go For Register Application Registration Fail !!! Error Occurred when registering your application information to the server. Please contact your administrator Device In_Active Currently, your device has been blocked transaction to the server by your administrator. Application Has No License !!! Currently, your application has no license for using on this device.

To continue, your application must have license key. Request your license by using the following button Application License Request
Request Request Pending !!! Requesting license for your application has been successfully finished and it is in pending state.

For next steps, your admin needs to approve license requests. Request Failed !!! Error occurred when requesting your application license from the server. Try Again No Extra License !!! Currently, there is no extra license key for your application.

Buy more license key for your application. FAMS
